channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Qubely – Advanced Gutenberg Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Qubely – Advanced Gutenberg Blocks

item.title: CVE-2021-25013|2024-08-03T19:49:14.630Z -- unknown -- qubely%20%E2%80%93%20advanced%20gutenberg%20blocks
item.description: The Qubely WordPress plugin before 1.7.8 does not have authorisation and CSRF check on the qubely_delete_saved_block AJAX action, and does not ensure that the block to be deleted belong to the plugin, as a result, any authenticated users, such as subscriber can delete arbitrary posts
